item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya

item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/right-click-to-set-outline-color-in-coreldraw/#comment-684">Samuel</a>.
Yep, doesn't work that way on macOS. Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Samuel.

Yep, doesn’t work that way on macOS. Thanks.

item.title: By: Samuel
item.dc:creator: Samuel
item.description: Thanks Yusuf Can't do this on Mac the option does not show in the customisation menu
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Yusuf
Can’t do this on Mac
the option does not show in the customisation menu
